name: HSP_TX_LINE_INFO
description: This table contains Line level transactions information from Hospital Permanent Transactions (HTR).

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: POST_DATE
columns.description: The post date for the transaction on the hospital account.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the service area associated with the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.

columns.name: LL_REV_CODE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the line-level revenue code for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.

columns.name: LL_REV_CODE_ID_REVENUE_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue code.

columns.name: LL_CPT_CODE
columns.description: This column stores the line-level CPT code for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.

columns.name: LL_MODIFIER
columns.description: This column stores the line-level modifier info for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.

columns.name: LL_SERVICE_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the line-level service date for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.

columns.name: LL_BILLED_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the line-level billed amount for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.

columns.name: LL_ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the line-level allowed amount for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.

columns.name: LL_NOT_ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the line-level not-allowed amount for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.

columns.name: LL_DED_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the line-level deductible amount for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.

columns.name: LL_COINS_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the line-level coinsurance amount for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.

columns.name: LL_COPAY_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the line-level copay amount for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.

columns.name: LL_NON_COVERED_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the line-level non-covered amount for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.

columns.name: LL_POSTED_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the line-level posted amount for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.

columns.name: LL_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the line-level adjustment amount for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.

columns.name: LL_REASON_CODES
columns.description: This column stores the line-level reason codes for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.

columns.name: LL_ACTIONS
columns.description: This column stores the line-level action string for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.

columns.name: LL_CONTROL_NUMBER
columns.description: This column stores the line-level control number for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.

columns.name: LL_QUANTITY
columns.description: This column stores the line-level quantity from remittance payments.
